Try to read the rhyme with the teacher

. Clear the screen and make a circle with your finger gesturing for the child to circle the mountain and say
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word: Mountain
while you circle the picture of the mountain and the word. Make an A-shape with your hands. Have the child repeat.
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word:
while you circle the picture of the mountain and the word. Pretend to draw a line with your hands and make a bump in the line to show the hill. Have the child repeat.
Identify the mountains and the hills
I see mountains, I see hills
mountains and ask the child, “What do you see?” while pointing to your eyes. Encourage the child to answer in a complete sentence,
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word:
while you circle the picture of the plateau and the word. Have the child repeat.
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word: Pla
while you circle the picture of the plain and the word. Make a straight line with your hands to show the action for plain. Have the child repeat.
Identify the plain and the plateau
I see a plain, I see a plateau
Circle the plateau and ask the child, “What do you see?” while pointing to your eyes. Encourage the child to answer in a complete sentence,
Do the actions for each place and have the child do the same.
Match the correct sight word to the picture
is a plain, This is a plateau, This is a hill
If necessary, complete the first match for the student
Read each landform and have the child read them as well
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word:
while you circle the picture of the river and the word. Make a curvy line with your hands
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word:
while you circle the picture of the ocean and the word. Spread your hands apart wide to show the action for the BIG ocean. Have the child repeat.
Identify the river and the ocean
I see a river, I see an ocean
Circle the river and ask the child, “What do you see?” while pointing to your eyes. Encourage the child to answer in a complete sentence,
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word:
while you circle the picture of the waterfall and the word. Make your hand move and then go down quickly to show the action for waterfall. Have the child repeat.
Identify the river and the waterfall
I see a river, I see a waterfall
Circle the river and ask the child, “What do you see?” while pointing to your eyes. Encourage the child to answer in a complete sentence,
Identify the ocean, mountains, and river and use the words in phrases
Circle the river, ocean and mountains one at a time. Ask, “What do you see?” Encourage child to answer in complete phrases,
I see a river, I see mountains, I see an ocean.
Complete the sentence frame with the correct word:
we need to take care of the Earth
Circle the earth, the heart and the people
taking care of the Earth. Say,
e need to take care of the Earth
we need to take care of the Earth
Circle the picture of the trash and the bags. Say,
with an action of picking up pretend trash and putting it into a pretend bag. Have the child repeat.
we need to take care of the Earth
Circle the picture of the hand turning off the water. Say,
with an action of pretending to turn off a water faucet. Have the child repeat.
Find the river, mountains, plain and ocean and say the name of each place
Do the action for river, mountain, plain and ocean
Ask the child, “What do you see?” Encourage them to find landforms on their own and say the names of the places in complete sentences,
I see a river, I see a plain, I see mountains, I see an ocean
Say these places one at a time: river, mountain, plain and ocean. Have the child do the action for each landform.

Word Wall Vocabulary Builder Activity – Slide 22
Students will read and spell their new words:
mountain, hill, plateau, plain, river, ocean, waterfall
Teacher will give feedback on the spelling and pronunciation of the new words.
